snippet: The president-elect used Twitter to assure Americans that the handover of power was going well, despite accounts of infighting on his team....
abstract: Pres-elect Donald J Trump sends out early-morning Twitter burst asserting his transition is going smoothly in response to news reports of firings and infighting; delay in selecting top advisers is blocking official handoff of critical information from 100 federal agencies.

byline.contributor: Julie Hirschfeld Davis and Michael S. Schmidt contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The president-elect used Twitter to assure Americans that the handover of power was going well, despite accounts of infighting on his team.

headline.main: Trump Says Transition’s Going ‘Smoothly,’ Disputing Disarray Reports
headline.print_headline: Trump Takes to Twitter in Defense of Transition
